column5: Any good spots to get bait on the way to Lake Ogascanan via North Bay? We used Trout Lake Bait previously and we would like a new suppliers of leeches. Thanks.

gholtzThere is (was) a bait shop on Trout Lake road (#63) on your left just after turning off highway 17. They used to sell leeches by the pound,I think they are still in business.http://maps.google.ca/maps/place?rlz...86144312218696
Thanks ill look into that one!
